page.title: 09Mrs.Bartsch ,Hotel owner
page.content: The hotel is open from April till October.The name of the hotel is the {Glenburn House}Hotel,and there are six chalets and three bathrooms.Mrs Bartsch the hotel owner,gets up at eight thirty and goes up to the hotel,sets the tables and does the breakfast.The hotel opens at half past eight until eleven o'clock.The bar is open at half past five until eleven o'clock. The hotel is quite near the road. One famous person who has visited the hotel isRicherd Fox.Mrs Bartsch likes the{hotel life}because of meeting different people.Lots of different people go to Glenburn House,some of them canoeists,some Americans.The hotel is also used for golfers dinner dances and for weddings.
